item.title: How to mount NTFS in Mac
item.description: Install FUSE FUSE for macOS allows you to extend macOS’s native file handling capabilities via third-party file systems. You could install it here. Install ntfs-3g Use brew install ntfs-3g If you run into error, Error: Could not symlink sbin/mkntfs. You need to use the absolute path to run the following function. Next, we need to umount our driver, since it only has read permission. And create an endpoint for it. Then we could use ntfs-3g to mount the driver.

item.title: Spark for ETL
item.description: There is not much information about how could we perform complex operation on pySpark. I summary some tips from stackoverflow and my experience. Hope it will be helpful for you. How to Read JSON to DataFrame There are serveral ways to read json in Spark. The most common way is to load json in a DataFrame. Why not rdd? Because json contains some hierachy information and it could not represent well in RDD.
